entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The organization described in the text that offers various benefits, development programs, and has a focus on diversity and inclusion.

entities.name: EMPLOYEES
entities.description: Individuals working for the company, benefiting from various programs and initiatives.

entities.name: STOCKHOLDERS
entities.description: Individuals or entities holding equity in the company.

relationships.relationship_description: The company offers various benefits, development programs, and focuses on diversity and inclusion for the employees.
The company's compensation program aligns employees' interests with those of stockholders.
